full_summary:
**Medical Mobile Treatment Centre (MTC) Tender Announcement**
==========================================================

**Reference Number:** M4000-4-4265
**Bid Deadline:** December 3, 2024, at 13:00 EST
**Tender Description:**

The Royal Canadian Mounted Police (RCMP) is soliciting bids for one (1) Medical Mobile Treatment Centre (MTC) Insert to be used on a 2023 Dodge RAM Big Horn 3500 Crew Cab with a long box (Base model D28H92) for delivery to Lower Sackville, Nova Scotia.

**Deliverables and Timeline:**

All deliverables must be received on or before March 31, 2025.

**Selection Criteria:**

To be considered responsive, bids must meet all requirements outlined in the bid solicitation and satisfy all mandatory technical evaluation criteria identified in Attachment 1 of Part 4. The responsive bid with the lowest evaluated price will be recommended for award of a contract. In the event of a tie, bids with the earliest delivery date will be given preference.

**Submission Requirements:**

Bids must be submitted electronically to the RCMP Bid Receiving Unit at ATL\_Bid\_Receiving@rcmp-grc.gc.ca.

**Tender Documents:**

Please refer to the attached tender documents for further information.

**Business Registration:**

Consider registering your business in the Indigenous Business Directory (IBD) to increase visibility and potentially access federal government contracts set aside for Indigenous businesses.

**Contact Information:**

For more information, please contact Beth Churchill at beth.churchill@rcmp-grc.gc.ca or (782) 641-0745.

**Federal Tendering Requirements:**

The RCMP has adopted the Integrity Regime administered by Public Services and Procurement Canada. All bids will be subject to the Integrity Provisions outlined in the bid solicitation.

**Notice of Tender:**

Canada retains the right to negotiate with any supplier on any procurement. The RCMP has made available Notices of Proposed Procurement (NPP) and bid solicitations at https://canadabuys.canada.ca/en/tender-opportunities. It is the responsibility of the bidder to regularly consult this website for the most up-to-date information.

**Closing Date for Tender Submissions:**
```markdown
Dec 03, 2024, 13:00 EST
```
